title: Zeit Want My TDZ 2/8: Pfizer, Academy Awards, NBA, Peloton, Brooklyn Museum, Winter Olympics
itunes:title: Zeit Want My TDZ 2/8: Pfizer, Academy Awards, NBA, Peloton, Brooklyn Museum, Winter Olympics
description:
In this edition of Zeit Want My TDZ, Jack and super producer Anna discuss Pfizer profiting even more than usual from human sadness, 2022 Oscar nominations, the NBA trade deadline, Peloton downsizing, the Brooklyn Museums Virgil Abloh retrospective, and the Winter Olympics.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
